title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node + browser).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model (docker-run one-liner).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting with Ollama models from Rails or scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Specialised tool to run ChemStar-7B and other chemistry LLMs via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers users using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to chat with local LLMs through Ollama in channels/DM.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU nodes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and native JSON parsing.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK and CLI for Ollama supporting C#/F# with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama with cross-compilation and static linking.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-model-mirror
summary: Scripts to mirror Ollama model library to an internal registry/air-gapped env.
